original_title: Berryz工房コンサートツアー2005秋〜スイッチON！〜
overview: Berryz Kobo was a Japanese idol girl group part of Hello! Project, produced by Tsunku. "Switch On!" features their 2005 tour graduation concert for Ishimura Maiha, it was filmed on October 2nd, 2005 at Tokyo Kousei Nenkin Assembly Hall.
title: Berryz Kobo Concert Tour 2005 Aki: Switch On!
